synopsis.text: Toshizo Hijikata and Souji Okita, two legendary ronin, cross paths with Nio, an orphaned dreamer, in this action-packed manga set in the tumultuous year of 1863. As Japan teeters on the brink of revolution, these two formidable warriors inspire Nio to join their cause, revealing to him the world-changing power of a few well-wielded swords. Together with the notorious Wolves of Mibu, who would later become the renowned Shinsengumi, Nio embarks on a perilous journey to shape the future of Japan and create a better world for all. But amidst the chaos of political upheaval and shifting loyalties, can Nio remain steadfast in his pursuit of justice? Join Nio and the Wolves of Mibu in this riveting samurai series that shares its setting with Rurouni Kenshin, as they fight for justice and for themselves.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
